name: Laser Defender (ForeverThinking)
description:
Take to space and defend yourself against wave after wave of enemies. Try to last as long as you can and rack up that score. My current best is 20,550 (due to expreience gained by extensive play-testing), so there's the benchmark!

Use the WASD or cursor keys to control your ship and use the spacebar to shoot (hold to keep firing).

Developed by Mark Dixon (ForeverThinking), licenced under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/

Based on the game taught in https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse/ by Rick Davidson, Ben Tristem, and GamDev.tv.

Laser effects:
Rawdanitsu at OpenGameArt

Space ship construction:
Skorpio at OpenGameArt

Explosion sprite:
Cuzco at OpenGameArt

Music:
Cynicmusic at OpenGameArt

Explosion SFX:
V-ktor at Freesound

Font:
Grafito Design at Dafont
